channel.title: Smite
channel.description:
anyone play?
its a free moba that similar to Lol/HoN/Dota except you get the third person feel of of an mmo. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4I7kDcRdM2Q
its a lot fun to play and watch
the champions are gods from different traditions/cultures/religions, voice acting is good, the client is smooth and the ui is very straightforward, and there are options to auto-level and auto-buy items for new people.
